welcomeSubtitle: We're excited to have you. Let's get your account set up in a few simple steps.
featuresSubtitle: Here are some of the powerful tools at your fingertips.
profileSubtitle: This information helps us personalize your experience and ensure compliance.
finalizeSetupSubtitle: Click below to connect your email account and generate your API key. This will complete the setup.
invalidApiKey: The provided API Key is invalid.
setupFailedManualPrompt: Please complete the setup manually. Your API key has been sent to your email.
aiAssistantDesc: Leverage AI to write better subject lines, generate email content, and optimize your campaigns.
validationDesc: Improve your deliverability by validating your email lists to remove invalid or risky addresses.
userEmailNotFound: User email not found. Cannot create account.
accountConnectedSuccess: Your MegaMail account has been connected!
